sentences: Ta on hea töö tegema ja tingimusi täitma.
context: The Estonian verb 'täitma' means to fulfill, execute, carry out, or perform. It is used when talking about completing obligations, requirements, duties, or filling positions/spaces. The word can be conjugated in various tenses and forms (like täitan - I fulfill, täidame - we fulfill, täidavad - they fulfill) depending on the subject and tense needed.
